full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,('DI NI BLA MA MCHOD 'BREL BA'I BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU'O, ,'DI LTAR ZHES PA NAS ZHES SOGS KYIS SMON LAM DANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BRGYAN PAR BYA, BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS 'DUG BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA'I 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNY'A NA BADZRA GYI SLOB MA THA SHAL BA DKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHID NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MJOD, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
